Summon_Sentries.display_help: The Sentry Boss can summon 3 Sentry minions of there is trouble.
Summon_Sentries.display_target_help: The Sentry Boss can summon 3 Sentry minions of there is trouble.

Ion_Burst.display_help: Sends a large blast of charged particles at a foe. Deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.
Ion_Burst.display_target_help: Sends a large blast of charged particles at a foe. Deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

Ion_Field.display_help: You are taking some energy damage just being near Lanaru!
Ion_Field.display_target_help: You are taking some energy damage just being near Lanaru!

Thunder_Clap.display_help: Lanaru has Disoriented you with his Thunder Clap.
Thunder_Clap.display_target_help: Lanaru has Disoriented you with his Thunder Clap.

Hurricane.display_help: The wind and rain from Lanaru's Hurricane have reduced your range and accuracy.
Hurricane.display_target_help: The wind and rain from Lanaru's Hurricane have reduced your range and accuracy.

Lightning_Storm.display_help: Lanaru can summon a massive Lightning Storm overhead that will strike any foe that approaches the Witch Doctor. Lightning Bolts from this storm can knock down and damage all foes near the strike, and can cause panic. Lightning Bolts will continue to strike for the lifetime of the storm.
Lightning_Storm.display_target_help: Lanaru can summon a massive Lightning Storm overhead that will strike any foe that approaches the Witch Doctor. Lightning Bolts from this storm can knock down and damage all foes near the strike, and can cause panic. Lightning Bolts will continue to strike for the lifetime of the storm.

Ice_Storm.display_help: The Ice Storm is reducing your movement and attack speeds. You are also taking cold damage over time.
Ice_Storm.display_target_help: The Ice Storm is reducing your movement and attack speeds. You are also taking cold damage over time.

Blizzard.display_help: The Blizzard is freezing you. Your Accuracy, movement speed and attack speed are reduced. You are taking damage over time.
Blizzard.display_target_help: The Blizzard is freezing you. Your Accuracy, movement speed and attack speed are reduced. You are taking damage over time.

Freezing_Rain.display_help: The Freezing Rain is chilling you, reducing your Resistance, movement speed and attack speed. You are taking damage over time.
Freezing_Rain.display_target_help: The Freezing Rain is chilling you, reducing your Resistance, movement speed and attack speed. You are taking damage over time.

Spawn_Natterling.display_help: This power spawns the Merged Natterling Lt.
Spawn_Natterling.display_target_help: This power spawns the Merged Natterling Lt.

Panic.display_help: Natterlings run on animal like instincts and are mostly cowards. They will flee in panic if near death.
Panic.display_target_help: Natterlings run on animal like instincts and are mostly cowards. They will flee in panic if near death.

Scatter_Shards.display_help: Natterlings can hurl shards of themselves in a narrow cone.
Scatter_Shards.display_target_help: Natterlings can hurl shards of themselves in a narrow cone.

Sinew.display_help: The Natterling has held you within it's fibrous Sinew.
Sinew.display_target_help: The Natterling has held you within it's fibrous Sinew.

Natterling_Transform.display_help: This power is simply the visual fx for a transformed Natterling Lt.
Natterling_Transform.display_target_help: This power is simply the visual fx for a transformed Natterling Lt.

Merge.display_help: Two Natterlings can combine their biomatter to form a larger version of itself!
Merge.display_target_help: Two Natterlings can combine their biomatter to form a larger version of itself!

Hand_Clap.display_help: Tyrant has Disoriented you with his Hand Clap.
Hand_Clap.display_target_help: Tyrant has Disoriented you with his Hand Clap.

Total_Focus.display_help: Tyrant has Disoriented you with his power of Total Focus!
Total_Focus.display_target_help: Tyrant has Disoriented you with his power of Total Focus!

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.
Power_Blast.display_target_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

Explosive_Blast.display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.
Explosive_Blast.display_target_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

Nova.display_help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Nova.display_target_help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long

Energy_Aura.display_help: You are taking some energy damage just being near Ruladak!
Energy_Aura.display_target_help: You are taking some energy damage just being near Ruladak!

Crystal_of_Vigor.display_help: When a Brute minion is in peril, he can release the power in his crystal to give himself and all his nearby allies a buff to their damage.
Crystal_of_Vigor.display_target_help: When a Brute minion is in peril, he can release the power in his crystal to give himself and all his nearby allies a buff to their damage.

Crystal_of_Corruption.display_help: Ruladak has weakened you and reduced your Damage, your Damage Resistance, and your Defense.
Crystal_of_Corruption.display_target_help: Ruladak has weakened you and reduced your Damage, your Damage Resistance, and your Defense.

Summon_Elemental.display_help: The Witch Doctor can summon a Husk to fight at his side.
Summon_Elemental.display_target_help: The Witch Doctor can summon a Husk to fight at his side.
